contextId.information: This is an expression that means talking with other people. AT: "ask people to help me understand the message" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_idiom]])
"take care of the needs of the poor" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_idiom]])
The words "were found to be" are an idiom that emphasizes that "we are" certainly sinners. AT: "we see that we also certainly are sinners" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_idiom]])
contextId.quote: we too, were found to be sinners
